omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
        d.DiagnosisICD,
        apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
        apc.NHSNumber,
        apc.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
    inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
        on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: measurement_date

dataSource.name: CDSActivityDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell.

omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
        d.DiagnosisICD,
        apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
        apc.NHSNumber,
        apc.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
    inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
        on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: measurement_datetime

dataSource.name: CDSActivityDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell.

omopColumns.name: measurement_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. EHR episode record

omopColumns.name: measurement_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to standard or non standard OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
        d.DiagnosisICD,
        apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
        apc.NHSNumber,
        apc.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
    inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
        on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: value_source_value
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve Measurement domain ICD10 codes to `Maps To Value` concepts.
omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
        d.DiagnosisICD,
        apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
        apc.NHSNumber,
        apc.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
    inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
        on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: measurement_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `measurement` domain.

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
        d.DiagnosisICD,
        apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
        apc.NHSNumber,
        apc.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
    inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
        on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
